title: WSAPackagingTool makes it easier to modify the Windows Subsystem for Android
content:
For years, if Windows users wanted to run their favorite Android apps on their computer, they’d have to do so via third-party emulators or other unofficial methods. Now, with Windows 11 and its Windows Subsystem for Android (WSA) feature, you can easily run smartphone apps on your PC. Microsoft’s Android environment ships with the Amazon

The post WSAPackagingTool makes it easier to modify the Windows Subsystem for Android appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Trying to mod Windows Subsystem for Android? WSAPackagingTool is an easy to use utility to repack the WSA installer with your choice of mods.
